attributes.action: Teach about Mental Health in Schools
attributes.additional_details: I think it is important for young people to learn and become educated about there own mental health but also the different challenges others face in order to create a better understanding of these complex mental heath issues
attributes.background: My aim is to get primary schools to teach about the different variety of mental Health conditions including OCD, Bipolar, PTSD, Tourettes and Schizophrenia and the many other mental illness subtypes

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561016
